inclusion.criterion: United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) Level 2A/B or 3
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Comprehend all the procedures of this study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Need support of artificial liver or kidney, ventilator-dependant, coma or unstable
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a history of hypersensitivity to hydroxyethyl starch or albumin
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Wilson disease, but no other conditions that would make them ineligible.
